metadata.Title: CVE-2015-0842 on Ubuntu 16.04 FIPS Certified (xenial) - medium.
metadata.Description:
[SQL injection issues (potential auth bypass)]

Update Instructions:

Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2015-0842` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
by updating your system to the following package versions:

yubiserver - 0.6-3
No subscription required

criterions.comment: yubiserver package in xenial, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '0.6-3').
